name: Powder
headline: AI Agents for precise document analysis
description:
Powder is an AI tool that helps wealth advisors rapidly create sales proposals that are personalized for each prospective client.  Using LLMs, Powder is able to automate a series of manual tasks such as understanding documents and conversations to create mind-blowing analysis that builds immediate trust.

Powder has 3 main features to automate sales workflows -

1. Brokerage, tax and estate document parser thats fast and accurate.
2. Meeting notetaker thats able to capture personalized insights.
3. Portfolio analysis tool that optimizes portfolio returns, risk and fees.

Our app saves hours of time and creates a pinpoint proposal that lifts a firm's ability to win new business.

founders.name: Kanishk Parashar, Founder
founders.description: cofounder/CEO Powder - AI growth platform for wealth advisors.  Previously, I was cofounder/CEO of RCI Navigator.  Navigator helps asset and wealth managers to pace into private assets such as VC, PE, Infra, etc. while taking risks into account.  It was acquired by Addepar in Jan 2021.  Navigator is used by 150+ firms including UBS and Morgan Stanley.  Before that I was cofounder/CEO of Coin (YCW13).  Coin was a all-in-one digital credit card that combined all your cards into one.

founders.name: Soo Yung Cho, Founder
founders.description: Sooyung is the co-founder and CTO of Powder, AI sales copilot for wealth advisors. Prior to founding Powder, Sooyung was a founding team member of RCI which was acquired by Addepar in 2021. Sooyung graduated from Johns Hopkins with a BS degree in Computer Science. Out of work, he enjoys playing lacrosse.

founders.name: David Goerz, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder & Chief Investment Officer for Powder Finance, which is building an AI Sales co-Pilot for wealth advisors to automate gathering financial holdings, analyze portfolios, assess risk tolerance, and summarize data to engage faster and efficiently.

He managed portfolio strategies for institutional asset owners for 33 yrs on mandates up to $30B in assets with pioneering innovations in quantitative equity and return forecasting, optimization and risk management. Chair, Investment Committees

founders.name: Dominic Tully, Founder
founders.description: I am currently the co-founder and Head of Sales and Operations at Powder. Prior to Powder, I work at the fintech firm, Addepar, as both a Senior Account Executive and Senior Account Manager. I started my career at Goldman Sachs, where I worked in the Private Wealth Management division in San Francisco.

Demo
Why Powder
## Turn Unorganized Information into High Quality and Actionable Data
### ELIMINATE MANUAL LABOR
### ELIMINATE MANUAL LABOR
### ELIMINATE MANUAL LABOR
### FOCUS ON CLIENTS
### FOCUS ON CLIENTS
### FOCUS ON CLIENTS
### SCALE WITH AI
### SCALE WITH AI
### SCALE WITH AI
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/02lwoxsawaT4LZlQs54UgWrAGGM.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/xQpaMPaZ7bd0stW3Z4jUh4eQI.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BkOf5ulRMjtuNAD5DuWauegMY.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/v6wZjcya3uxxDwbKPUKwbEmmow.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/8etfVGsyK5DkkrhAHC0zYGjZdA.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/hFReo4DhrtSrnYKerfinQahlQk.png)
Benefits
## Optimize Efficiency and Enhance Client Satisfaction.
Deliver superior client service with faster operations and improved utilization for your firm’s resources.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/FOxxRJpYsXhpOjDZzLf7b3Vgs.svg)
### Cost Savings
Eliminate costly manual tasks performed by analysts and advisors.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/B1bNfMWD0DJGYpsbbvZn9W3Y.svg)
### Customer Satisfaction
Consistently deliver high quality output across the organization.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/cJEbTHw8SyRNay6Go64fv68mQ.svg)
### Reduced Errors
AI enabled and AI reviewed tasks result in better-than-human accuracy.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/G1qlSr4FX0ax3f3H0mgczSj4P8.svg)
### Increased Productivity
Free up analysts for higher-value tasks like proactive client engagement.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/qYsCStQdcBwPs40zyDx1YqsvZRA.svg)
### Time Savings
Reduce data extraction and entry time by 95%, validated by customer.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/SMVURTy4ZZ19qNNh4Lvg2W8Iw.svg)
### Compliance
Ensure adherence to SEC/FINRA standards with built-in compliance features.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/hf0FwJXMy8KmvgqzKjanzqm91ZA.svg)
### Scalability
Grow efficiently with AI agents, rather than headcount.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/dKUnC9wzPN3tKGmM7AUjFPpj4Y.svg)
### Security
Ensure data protection with advanced encryption and secure protocols.
Security
## Enterprise Security
Powder is built with security top of mind. Trusted by the largest and most regulated global institutions.
## Completed
## Completed
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/qvivVFC1bM2A2BTXfuMtN7fHFI.svg)
### SOC2 II Type 1
Effective controls meeting industry standards for security assurance.
## Pending
## Pending
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/qvivVFC1bM2A2BTXfuMtN7fHFI.svg)
### SOC2 II Type 2
Continued monitoring of industry standards for security assurance.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/n4pTHkS9NxecU0f5K11VhqRw0.svg)
### Encrypted in Transit and at Rest
Data is always encrypted during transfer and storage for maximum protection.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ZB27QSDJWTGYhJTVNUIN9LcOcI.svg)
### No Training On User Data
Your data remains private and is never used for model training.
Testimonials
## Testimonials
Explore client testimonials to gain insights into their experiences and how we've contributed to their success.
  * “Parsing and analysis normally takes 4-5 hours per document. Those 4-5 hours are so draining when you want to focus on building a book, rather than mind numbing tedious tasks.”
Menlo Park based RIA
  * “Typically, manually parsing a statement can take between 30 minutes on the short end to upwards of 2-3 hours on the high end. The Primary task we’re now able to complete is the analysis for the prospect in a super efficient and timely manner. Our turnaround times have dramatically increased as the result of Powder.”
San Francisco based RIA
  * "Instead of inputting numbers into Excel to figure out weightings for a client's portfolio, Powder creates that for us for multiple statements in minutes. This allows us to spend more time on clients' needs and less time being a calculator."
Ben Tuscai, Sunpointe Investments

Benefits
## Optimize Efficiency and Enhance Client Satisfaction.
Deliver superior client service with faster operations and improved utilization for your firm’s resources.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/FOxxRJpYsXhpOjDZzLf7b3Vgs.svg)
### Cost Savings
Eliminate costly manual tasks performed by analysts and advisors.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/B1bNfMWD0DJGYpsbbvZn9W3Y.svg)
### Customer Satisfaction
Consistently deliver high quality output across the organization.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/cJEbTHw8SyRNay6Go64fv68mQ.svg)
### Reduced Errors
AI enabled and AI reviewed tasks result in better-than-human accuracy.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/G1qlSr4FX0ax3f3H0mgczSj4P8.svg)
### Increased Productivity
Free up analysts for higher-value tasks like proactive client engagement.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/qYsCStQdcBwPs40zyDx1YqsvZRA.svg)
### Time Savings
Reduce data extraction and entry time by 95%, validated by customer.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/SMVURTy4ZZ19qNNh4Lvg2W8Iw.svg)
### Compliance
Ensure adherence to SEC/FINRA standards with built-in compliance features.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/hf0FwJXMy8KmvgqzKjanzqm91ZA.svg)
### Scalability
Grow efficiently with AI agents, rather than headcount.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/dKUnC9wzPN3tKGmM7AUjFPpj4Y.svg)
### Security
Ensure data protection with advanced encryption and secure protocols.
Security
## Enterprise Security
Powder is built with security top of mind. Trusted by the largest and most regulated global institutions.
## Completed
## Completed
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/qvivVFC1bM2A2BTXfuMtN7fHFI.svg)
### SOC2 II Type 1
Effective controls meeting industry standards for security assurance.
## Pending
## Pending
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/qvivVFC1bM2A2BTXfuMtN7fHFI.svg)
### SOC2 II Type 2
Continued monitoring of industry standards for security assurance.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/n4pTHkS9NxecU0f5K11VhqRw0.svg)
### Encrypted in Transit and at Rest
Data is always encrypted during transfer and storage for maximum protection.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ZB27QSDJWTGYhJTVNUIN9LcOcI.svg)
### No Training On User Data
Your data remains private and is never used for model training.

generated_description:
### Company Summary: Powder

**Overview:**  
Powder, founded in 2023 and proudly a part of Y Combinator's W24 batch, is revolutionizing how wealth advisors operate. Its mission is straightforward: use AI agents for precise document analysis that saves time and boosts efficiency in creating personalized sales proposals. The technology leverages large language models (LLMs) to automate time-consuming manual tasks, transforming complex documents and conversations into insightful analyses that foster immediate trust with clients.

**Key Features:**  
Powder comes equipped with three powerful tools that streamline sales workflows in the wealth management sector:

1. **Document Parser:** This feature efficiently processes brokerage, tax, and estate documents with speed and accuracy.
   
2. **Meeting Notetaker:** Captures personalized insights during meetings, allowing advisors to focus on conversations without losing essential details.
   
3. **Portfolio Analysis Tool:** Helps optimize portfolio returns, risk, and fees, providing a clear view of investment performance.

These tools significantly reduce tedious tasks, potentially saving advisors up to 95% of their time, enabling them to focus more on client engagement and less on manual calculations.

**Impact:**  
By automating critical aspects of financial advisory work, Powder helps firms deliver tailor-made proposals swiftly, enhancing their competitive edge in winning new business. Additionally, the platform boasts features that ensure compliance with SEC/FINRA standards while safeguarding client data.

**Team & Backing:**  
The Powder team consists of six dedicated professionals, backed by Garry Tan as their Group Partner. Despite being a nascent startup, they have already caught the industry's attention, being shortlisted on the 2024 CB Insights list of the "100 Most Innovative Fintech Startups."

**Client Testimonials:**  
The feedback from early adopters, such as Sunpointe Investments, underscores Powder's effectiveness in streamlining operations. Advisors have reported drastic reductions in their workload, with some tasks that previously took hours now completed in mere minutes. This not only enhances efficiency but also enriches client relationships by allowing advisors to allocate more time to high-value interactions.

**Website:**  
To explore more about Powder and its offerings, visit [www.powderfi.com](https://www.powderfi.com).

In short, Powder isn't just another fintech tool; it's a game-changer for wealth advisors looking to leverage AI for unprecedented efficiency and client satisfaction. If you’re in the field, it’s worth checking out.
